## ScriptingSystem.detachAllScripts() method

Detaches all scripts from all hosts.

Iteratively calls [ScriptingSystem.detachScript()](doc/markdown/./scene.scriptingsystem.detachscript.md) on each host until no attachments remain.

**Signature:**

```typescript
detachAllScripts(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
